operator.name: Extreme Gradient Boosting Regressor
operator.synopsis: This operator learns gradient boost trees from both nominal and numerical data.
operator.help: Extreme Gradient Booosting Regresor based on XGBoost4J library (https://xgboost.readthedocs.io). XGBoost stands for "Extreme Gradient Boosting", where the term "Gradient Boosting" originates from the paper Greedy Function Approximation: A Gradient Boosting Machine, by Friedman.
